en.issuedAppStatusMsgDetails: Your application has passed checks by court staff and the next stage of your divorce has begun. You’ll be sent a ’notice of proceedings’ by post confirming this.
en.issuedWhatHappensNextDetail1: The divorce centre sent the application to your {{ case.divorceWho }} by post on {{ case.issueDate | date }}. They were also sent an ‘acknowledgement of service’. This is a form which asks if they:
en.issuedWhatHappensNextDetails2list1: agree with what you’ve said in the application
en.issuedWhatHappensNextDetails2list2: intend to try to stop the divorce (defend it)
en.issuedWhatHappensNextDetails2list3: object to paying the costs (if you've claimed them)
en.issuedWhatHappensNextDetails3: They have been asked to respond within 7 days. Contact the divorce centre if you haven’t heard anything back after 21 days.
